admin-management.title: Admin Management
admin-management.subtitle: Add and remove administrations to/from this platform

remove-dialog.title: Remove admin '{{username}}'?
remove-dialog.description: By removing this administrator, the user will immediately lose access to the admin area. The administrator can be re-added at any time.

add-dialog.title: Add new admin
add-dialog.description: By adding a new administrator, the user will immediately gain access to the admin area. Be sure to insert a valid username, since it is not validated against existing users.

bulk-dialog.finish: Review the selected options and click the button below to complete the operation.

help.years: In "Degree-wide" elections, all students of a given degree, regardless of their curricular year, can cast a vote. They should be used when there aren't elections per curricular year, but an election for the whole degree.

bulk-dialog.title: Create Elections in Bulk

election-management.title: Election Management
election-management.subtitle: Create, edit and see results of elections

unverified-nominations-alert.text_one: {{count}} nomination has not been validated. Students can only vote once all nominations have been validated. Please validate this nomination before voting starts.
unverified-nominations-alert.text_other: {{count}} nominations have not been validated. Students can only vote once all nominations have been validated. Please validate these nominations before voting starts.

elections.empty: There are no elections at the moment
elections.title: Elections

candidacy-period.title: Candidacy Period
candidacy-period.has-nominated: You have already nominated a student for this election
candidacy-period.subtitle: Candidacies from {{start, datetime}} to {{end, datetime}}

nominate.others: I want to nominate another student
nominate.others-info: Nominations are subject to approval by the Pedagogical Council. It is only possible to nominate other students participating in this election.

voting-period.title: Voting Period
voting-period.has-voted: You have already voted in this election
voting-period.subtitle: Voting from {{start, datetime}} to {{end, datetime}}

error.description: Oops! An error has occurred while logging in

login.loading: Hang tight... We're logging you in
